ai-patthana18.9:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_0: Because his teaching doesn’t lead to for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_1: For the sake of not for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_2: Nor makes a refuge for the sake of contemplating causes and reasons.
ai-patthana18.9:2.1_0: Not knowing and not seeing the cause, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of conditioned phenomena,
ai-patthana18.9:2.1_1: for the sake of knowing and not seeing the cause or condition that gives rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana18.9:2.1_2: Nor cause or reason for the sake of unconfused cause or reason.
